Class Coordinate

java.lang.Object
Coordinate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
public class Coordinate extends Object implements Comparable
Coordinate Class This class will implement the interface class Comparable. Used to Override 'compareTo' and 'equals'. The class itself is used to create coordinates to define positioning in the project. And will be used in nearly every file -Implemented - The ability to get/set X and Y coordinates - Compare the similarity of two set of coordinates
